title: [NA] Silver Tournament Team :: Team Elo Complexity Seeking Active Players=>>
body:
Team Name : **Team Elo Complexity **
Tournament Website : **[Compete League :: Bronze & Silver League](https://lol.competeleague.com/#/leagues-silver-premier)**
Tournament Stream : **[Compete League Twitch Stream](https://www.twitch.tv/competeleague)**
TLDR; Below is a lot of information about our team and the league we are in. Our application for our team is at the bottom of this page.


**Serious Inquiries:**  Be on at 1:30 PM PST for Tryouts. 
_**Side NOTE**_: If you were **GOLD** or **HIGHER** last season **DO NOT APPLY
**
TRYOUTS Will be around **1:30 PM PST** 6/8/2016

FILL OUT THE FORUM TO BE ADDED

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Currently **Recruiting**

Top: Filled
JGL: Filled
Starting MID
Starting AD Carry
Starting Support
Substitution's for all Roles
Coaches, Analysts, and Volunteers
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
About the League : Compete League is a tournament league open to all divisions of play. We play in the Bronze & Silver League. There is a Premier League and Open League. To play in the Open League, our team needs a complete team of Five players. You can think of the open league as a 'Practice' and 'Scrim' league that you play in before the premier league. The next season for the premier league begins in June. We plan to play in this league. As a team, we will need to play against other teams in the Open League and qualify for a spot in the premier league.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Days : Each Monday of the month, between the times of **4:30 PM** to **8:00 PM** Pacific Standard Time (Possibility of later nights based on game length) Game day schedule subject to change based on tournament admins discretion.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Able to play at a high caliber competitively.
Willing to accept a try-outs weather they be 1 game or 10.
Able to adapt and adjust play styles to fit the team, composition, and enemy team.
Excel in communication with a team of Four others to achieve positive outcomes on Discord.
Able to provide positive reinforcement and critique for yourself as well as team members in constructive manners.
An open schedule with room to work in practice with the team and game days.
Between the divisions of Bronze 5 and Silver 1.
If you are interested, we ask that you fill out our short Q&A in a post below.

Thank you, 
Fiasivimadoh

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Briefly describe your play style : Varies, mostly aggressive.
Your strongest attributes :Warding,kiting,listening
Your weakest attributes : Overly aggressive as support sometimes,under aggressive as an adc in lane
Why you would like to be apart of a tournament team : Learning and building with a team
Your past experience on a tournament style team or ranked team (If Applicable) : Numerous warcraft 3 tournaments (esl,wcg, etc.) none in league
The best time to reach you in-game : whenever

Solo Queue Division :S VI
Discord Communication Application & Microphone Accessible (Y/N) :Yes
List; Your Top 3 Champions for Role Applying :Blitz crank, Sona, Jana
Briefly describe your play style :zoning out players from cs and aggressive early game
Your strongest attributes : Can land most of my skill shot to let others get fed
Your weakest attributes : Rembering to upgrade trinkets when i get 9
Why you would like to be apart of a tournament team : To have an better experience in the Competitive lol community

The best time to reach you in-game :Anytime, will be on all day most of the time.

**In-game Name **: ImLaz
**Age :** 15 (mature)
**Timezone :** EST
**Role :** ADC
**Solo Queue Division :** Silver 3
**Discord Communication Application & Microphone Accessible (Y/N) :** Yes
**List; Your Top 3 Champions for Role Applying :** Vayne, Caitlyn, Tristana/Lucain
**Briefly describe your play style :** I tend to play late game carries, but I am also an aggressive player who can follow up on plays and farm when needed. 
**Your strongest attributes :** Listening to calls, positioning, and team fights. 
**Your weakest attributes :** Shot calling and forgetting to buy wards. 
**Why you would like to be apart of a tournament team :** I always loved the competitive side of games and with a tournament team I would be able to compete and grow with a team of like minded people. 
**Your past experience on a tournament style team or ranked team (If Applicable) :** I have managed Master Tier teams that have compete in Battlegrounds and other high level tournaments so I know what it takes to prepare for a tournament. 
The best time to reach you in-game : Anytime after 11 pm EST 

Also, if you want more info on what I can offer, read my post.

Link: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/K8rkTpPE-silver-adcgraphic-designermanager-looking-for-serious-and-professional-team-or-organization
I will be adding people soon.  I have a lot to tryout.

The best time to reach you in-game : 2:30 pm est or later on weekdays and anytime on weekends.
